entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning late in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
